item.title: How to Build L2tp Over Ipsec VPN With Vyos
item.author: echo.wings@gmail.com (echowings)
item.description: How to build L2tp over ipsec vpn with vyos Today, I will show you how to build a l2tp over ipsec vpn with adsl wan address. Setup vpn on vyos Generate a preshare key 1 2 $ generate wireguard preshared-key uND0O6RYI1O833NL2+qwSrW4htMll1hJAUM2nPQaa8k= With authentication local configuration VPN Key Value WAN interface pppoe0 l2tp vpn network 172.
